verses.verse: <WG2532> You <WG5209> were made alive when you <WG5209> were <WG5607> dead <WG3498> in transgressions and <WG2532> sins, <WG266>

in <WG1722> which <WG3739> you once <WG4218> walked <WG4043> according to <WG2596> the course <WG165> of this <WG5127> world, <WG2889> according to <WG2596> the prince <WG758> of the power <WG1849> of the air, <WG109> the spirit <WG4151> who <WG3588> now <WG3568> works <WG1754> in <WG1722> the children <WG5207> of disobedience; <WG543>

among <WG1722> whom <WG3739> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> all <WG3956> once <WG4218> lived <WG390> in <WG1722> the lust <WG1939> of our <WG2257> flesh, <WG4561> doing <WG4160> the desires <WG2307> of the flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> of the mind, <WG1271> and <WG2532> were <WG1510> by nature <WG5449> children <WG5043> of wrath, <WG3709> even <WG2532> as <WG5613> the rest. <WG3062>
But <WG1161> God, <WG2316> being <WG5607> rich <WG4145> in <WG1722> mercy, <WG1656> for <WG1223> his <WG846> great <WG4183> love <WG26> with which <WG3739> he loved <WG25> us, <WG2248>

even <WG2532> when <WG5607> we <WG2248> were <WG5607> dead <WG3498> through our trespasses, <WG3900> made us alive together with <WG4806> Christ <WG5547> (by grace <WG5485> you have been <WG2075> saved <WG4982>),
and <WG2532> raised <WG4891> us up with him, <WG4891> and <WG2532> made <WG4776> us to sit with him <WG4776> in <WG1722> the heavenly <WG2032> places in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424>

that <WG2443> in <WG1722> the ages <WG165> to come <WG1904> he might show <WG1731> the exceeding <WG5235> riches <WG4149> of his <WG846> grace <WG5485> in <WG1722> kindness <WG5544> toward <WG1909> us <WG2248> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus; <WG2424>

for <WG1063> by grace <WG5485> you have been <WG2075> saved <WG4982> through <WG1223> faith, <WG4102> and <WG2532> that <WG5124> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> yourselves; <WG5216> it is the gift <WG1435> of God, <WG2316>
not <WG3756> of <WG1537> works, <WG2443> that <WG3361> no one <WG5100> would boast. <WG2744>

For <WG1063> we are <WG2070> his <WG846> workmanship, <WG4161> created <WG2936> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> for <WG1909> good <WG18> works, <WG2041> which <WG3739> God <WG2316> prepared <WG4282> before that <WG2443> we would walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> them. <WG846>

Therefore <WG1352> remember <WG3421> that <WG3754> once <WG4218> you, <WG5210> the Gentiles <WG1484> in <WG1722> the flesh, <WG4561> who are <WG3588> called <WG3004> "uncircumcision <WG203>" by <WG5259> that which is <WG3588> called <WG3004> "circumcision, <WG4061>" (in <WG1722> the flesh, <WG4561> made by hands <WG5499>);

that <WG3754> you were <WG2258> at <WG1722> that <WG1565> time <WG2540> separate <WG5565> from Christ, <WG5547> alienated <WG526> from the commonwealth <WG4174> of Israel, <WG2474> and <WG2532> strangers <WG3581> from the covenants <WG1242> of the promise, <WG1860> having <WG2192> no <WG3361> hope <WG1680> and <WG2532> without God <WG112> in <WG1722> the world. <WG2889>

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> you <WG5210> who <WG3588> once <WG4218> were <WG5607> far off <WG3112> are made <WG1096> near <WG1451> in <WG1722> the blood <WG129> of Christ. <WG5547>
For <WG1063> he <WG846> is <WG2076> our <WG2257> peace, <WG1515> who <WG3588> made <WG4160> both <WG297> one, <WG1520> and <WG2532> broke down <WG3089> the middle wall <WG3320> of partition, <WG5418>

having abolished <WG2673> in <WG1722> the <WG846> flesh <WG4561> the hostility, <WG2189> the law <WG3551> of commandments <WG1785> contained in <WG1722> ordinances, <WG1378> that <WG1519> he might <WG2443> create <WG2936> in <WG1722> himself <WG1438> one <WG1520> new <WG2537> man <WG444> of the two, <WG1417> making <WG4160> peace; <WG1515>

and <WG2532> <WG846> might reconcile <WG604> them both <WG297> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> body <WG4983> to God <WG2316> through <WG1223> the cross, <WG4716> having killed <WG615> the hostility <WG2189> thereby. <WG1722>
<WG2532> He came <WG2064> and preached <WG2097> peace <WG1515> to you <WG5213> who were <WG3588> far off <WG3112> and <WG2532> to those who were <WG3588> near. <WG1451>
For <WG3754> through <WG1223> him <WG846> we <WG2192> both <WG297> have <WG2192> our access <WG4318> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> Spirit <WG4151> to <WG4314> the Father. <WG3962>

So <WG3767> then <WG686> you are <WG2075> no longer <WG3765> strangers <WG3581> and <WG2532> foreigners, <WG3941> but <WG235> you are fellow citizens <WG4847> with the saints, <WG40> and <WG2532> of the household <WG3609> of God, <WG2316>

being built <WG2026> on <WG1909> the foundation <WG2310> of the apostles <WG652> and <WG2532> prophets, <WG4396> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> himself <WG846> being <WG5607> the chief cornerstone; <WG204>
in <WG1722> whom <WG3739> the whole <WG3956> building, <WG3619> fitted together, <WG4883> grows <WG837> into <WG1519> a holy <WG40> temple <WG3485> in <WG1722> the Lord; <WG2962>
in <WG1722> whom <WG3739> you <WG5210> also <WG2532> are built together <WG4925> for <WG1519> a habitation <WG2732> of God <WG2316> in <WG1722> the Spirit. <WG4151>
